name: FlexTroyer
description:
Hello there, this demo is made for a game jam called Quarantine Jam.

In this game you'll destroy a boat and then fix the holes with [censored].

That's it.

My apology if you're unsatisfied with the lack of content.

Play this game on 16:9 widescreen resolution, or else the UI may broke.

Now that's A LOT OF DAMAGE!!!!!!
